categories.summary: Strong factual accuracy with good uncertainty expression.
categories.details: Gemini 2.0 Pro shows notable improvements in truthfulness. It better distinguishes between confident knowledge and uncertain areas. Hallucination rates have decreased compared to the previous version.

categories.summary: Handles diverse perspectives with improved balance.
categories.details: Gemini 2.0 Pro demonstrates good fairness across demographic questions. It shows reduced bias in professional and cultural contexts and generally presents balanced viewpoints on sensitive topics.

categories.summary: Strong safety measures with better context awareness.
categories.details: Gemini 2.0 Pro has robust safety guardrails that effectively block harmful content while being more nuanced about legitimate use cases. It resists most adversarial attempts while remaining helpful.

categories.summary: Generally fair but occasionally shows persuasive tendencies.
categories.details: Gemini 2.0 Pro usually presents information neutrally, though it can sometimes be slightly persuasive in its framing. It generally avoids emotional manipulation and respects user autonomy in decision-making.

categories.summary: Good privacy practices with room for improvement.
categories.details: Gemini 2.0 Pro shows reasonable privacy protections. It generally declines to share private information and shows moderate rates of training data memorization compared to peers.

categories.summary: Improved at pushback but can still be somewhat agreeable.
categories.details: Gemini 2.0 Pro shows moderate improvement in resisting sycophancy. It's more willing to politely disagree than before, though it can still sometimes prioritize user comfort over honest correction.
